item.title: API-List
item.description:
Api List

  • What is an API?

  • How to design APIs that don’t suck

  • Awesome-APIs: A curated list of APIs from round the web.

  • Mobile API Security Techniques Part 2 — API Tokens, Oauth2, and Disappearing Secrets

  • 从达标到卓越：淘宝 API 设计之道

  • 2017-API-Security-Checklist: Checklist of the most important security countermeasures when designing, testing, and releasing your API.

  • 2017-OpenAPI and gRPC Side-by-Side: Both are open source efforts, both describe APIs, and both promise better experiences for API producers and consumers. So why do we need both? If we do, what value does each provide? What can each project learn from the other?

  • 2017-What are Web APIs: What exactly are Web APIs? Why are Web APIs so popular and widely used? Let’s first explore what APIs are so you can understand how they evolved into Web APIs.

OpenAPI

OpenSource

  • openapi-cop : A proxy that validates responses and requests against an OpenAPI document.

Mock Server

  • Mock.js

  • JSON Server

  • YApi : YApi 是一个可本地部署的、打通前后端及 QA 的、可视化的接口管理平台。

API Automation & Generation

  • automatic-api : The following is a list of tools that automatically expose a REST, GraphQL, or another kind of API for your database.

  • pREST : Serve a RESTful API from any PostgreSQL database

  • apig : Golang RESTful API Server Generator

  • xgenecloud : 🔥 🔥 Instantly generate REST & GraphQL APIs on any Database (Supports : MySQL, PostgreSQL, MsSQL, SQLite, MariaDB).

  • 2018-ginbro : Converting a MySQL database’schema to a RESTful golang APIs app in the fastest way.

API Management

  • WSO2 : WSO2 API Manager is a 100% open source enterprise-class solution that supports API publishing, lifecycle management, application development, access control, rate limiting and analytics in one cleanly integrated system.

  • DOClever : DOClever 是一个商业化开源产品，完全免费。无论你是前端工程师，还是后端工程师，接口永远都是两者交互的桥梁，所以 DOClever 专为中小型团队量身打造，旨在解决接口的管理，测试与数据生成，实现真正的一体化解决方案。

API Request Builder

  • 2019-PostWoman : 👽 API request builder - A free, fast, and beautiful alternative to Postman.

  • 2019-grpcui : An interactive web UI for gRPC, along the lines of postman.
